resources.string: Change the discover feed to whatever you want
This is the screen you get when you select \'Updates\' from the Discover screen, or swipe up from the Assistant window. It contains useful info like the weather, calendar events, reminders and lists.
Replace Discover with whatever app you want.\nNote: This will not be as seamless a transition as the Google Updates or original Discover screen, and may be buggy
Do nothing - effectively disable the module without having to uninstall it and reboot.
No app is selected to launch in DiscoverKiller
Swipe right to dismiss the shown view.\n\nNote: For compatibility reasons, this only works when the Google Assistant Updates option is selected. Swiping left is only partially supported.
Module is not enabled, or the hooks are not working (if the module is working, you can ignore this)
Created by Kieron Quinn / Quinny899 @ XDA
